You plan to visit 5 European cities for 21 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 7 days in Brussels. You want to spend 3 days in Paris. You want to spend 4 days in Frankfurt. You would like to meet your friends at Frankfurt between day 7 and day 10 to tour together. You want to spend 4 days in Budapest. You plan to visit relatives in Budapest between day 12 and day 15. You plan to stay in Salzburg for 7 days.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Frankfurt and Budapest, Budapest and Brussels, Salzburg and Frankfurt, Frankfurt and Paris, Paris and Budapest, from Brussels to Frankfurt, Paris and Brussels.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 21 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
